name: Military Medal
meaning: The Military Medal emoji represents honor, recognition, achievement, and formal awards. It is commonly used to celebrate accomplishments, excellence, and moments of earned recognition.

chat_examples.person_a: I received an award at work

when_to_use: Use this emoji when celebrating recognition, awards, honors, or significant achievements.
when_not_to_use: Avoid using it in casual jokes, sad conversations, or emotionally sensitive discussions.
